name: NekoBellow
storyline: Once upon a time a cat named Niko and his girlfriend Hikari decided to go on a picnic. They were enjoying a mountain of delicious sushi when suddenly an evil frog, Toshio, appeared and kidnapped Hikari! Without hesitation Niko climbed into his SkyNeko-98 fighter plane and took off after them. Help Niko rescue Hikari in NekoBellow, an exciting new Shoot ‘em Up Adventure game by MoonSoft Official.
summary: NekoBellow is a 2D Bullet Hell Side Scrolling Shoot 'em up game based on Arcade games of the 90's, there are even unique mechanics not seen before in any other game.
